issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Suppress verbose log message in BlockPlacementPolicyDefault

comments.body:
+1 pending Jenkins.

Thanks for the quick fix [~vagarychen]! cc [~szetszwo] who reported this.
Thanks [~arpitagarwal] for reporting the issue and [~vagarychen] for posting the fix. NIT: There is a minor tab/space issue in the 2nd line of the changed log. +1 pending Jenkins.
Thanks [~xyao] for pointing out the spacing issue, fixed it in v002 patch.

Whoa.. that's a lot of test failures and certainly unrelated to this logging change.

I will commit it shortly.

Pushed to 2.8.0.

Thank you for the contribution [~vagarychen] and thanks for the code review [~xyao]!
